item.title: Drug cartel reeling in huge profits with illegal fishing in Gulf of Mexico
item.description: The cartel allegedly uses fishing boats to smuggle drugs and migrants — and catch tons of red snapper, a commercially valuable but vulnerable species.

item.title: Police officer who Tasered 95-year-old woman convicted of manslaughter
item.description: An Australian police officer who Tasered 95-year-old great-grandmother Clare Nowland in her care home has been found guilty of manslaughter.
